nodes.text: Gang War is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on January 24 2002 as the second of the Year Two articles. It described the escalating tension in the Cularin system between Nirama and Rufus Trammel, in addition to the reactions of the Thaereian military and Senator Lavina Wren to the situation.
